name: Creamy Vinaigrette
description: Here is an easy vinaigrette that comes together in your blender in about five minutes. Use good olive oil and good vinegar, and follow your own taste when adding the seasoning.
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons or more good white wine vinegar
3 tablespoons sour cream, yogurt or mayonnaise

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients except shallot in a blender and turn on machine; a creamy emulsion will form within 30 seconds. Taste and add vinegar a teaspoon or two at a time until balance tastes right to you.
Add shallot and turn machine on and off a few times until shallot is minced within dressing. Taste, adjust the seasoning and serve.
